note:
I am multicraftual, but mostly into yarn stuff at the moment. Also posting about lego, handwriting and fountain pens, UX, birds, the state of the world, tea, my friend Alasdair the cat or his sister Olivia, books, and other stuff that catches my fancy.

Disabled, queer, nonbinary, leftie, antifash. Please tell me if I say something arseholey, happy to learn.

Also have an account where I post mostly in Swe/Nor, see below.

OffRav, missing my people there, esp. LSG & TFIMP.
